title: How to Find me a job in Burbank, CA
original_prompt: How to find a job in Burbank. Hide Disney jobs because I worked there before. Hide jobs more than 15 miles away. Don't offer part-time or gig jobs. The min pay $15/h. Use https://jopilot.net.
input1: Search for full-time job opportunities in Burbank, excluding any positions at Disney, and filter out listings that are more than 15 miles away. Ensure that all jobs listed offer a minimum pay of $15 per hour and do not include part-time or gig roles. Utilize the website https://jopilot.net for the search.
input2: Look for full-time employment options in Burbank, making sure to omit any Disney-related jobs due to previous employment there. Additionally, eliminate any job postings that exceed a 15-mile radius and focus only on positions that pay at least $15 an hour, avoiding part-time or gig opportunities. Use the platform https://jopilot.net to conduct the search.
input1_ans:
To find full-time job opportunities in Burbank while excluding Disney jobs and filtering for positions that are within 15 miles, pay at least $15 per hour, and are not part-time or gig roles, follow these steps:

1. **Visit the Website**: Go to [jopilot.net](https://jopilot.net).

2. **Set Location**: In the search bar, enter "Burbank, CA" as your location.

3. **Filter Job Type**: Look for options to filter job types and select "Full-Time" to exclude part-time and gig jobs.

4. **Set Salary Filter**: If available, set the minimum salary filter to $15/hour to ensure you only see jobs that meet your pay requirement.

5. **Exclude Disney Jobs**: Manually review the job listings to ensure that none of them are from Disney. You may need to look at the company names or descriptions to filter these out.

6. **Distance Filter**: Ensure that the job listings are within a 15-mile radius of Burbank. You may need to adjust the distance settings if the website allows it.

7. **Review Listings**: Go through the filtered job listings and apply to those that interest you.

By following these steps, you should be able to find suitable job opportunities in Burbank that meet your criteria.

I can't browse the internet or access external websites like https://jopilot.net. However, I can guide you on how to perform the search based on your criteria.

1. **Visit the website**: Go to [https://jopilot.net](https://jopilot.net).

2. **Set your location**: Enter "Burbank" in the location search bar and set the radius to "15 miles".

3. **Filter job types**: Look for options to exclude part-time jobs, gig jobs, and specifically exclude Disney jobs. This may be done through checkboxes or filters.

4. **Set salary requirements**: Ensure you set the minimum pay filter to $15 per hour.

5. **Search**: Click on the search button to view the listings that match your criteria.

6. **Review the listings**: Go through the job listings to find suitable full-time opportunities that meet all your specified requirements.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
input2_ans:
To find full-time job opportunities in Burbank while excluding Disney jobs and adhering to your specified criteria, follow these steps:

1. **Visit the Job Search Website**: Go to [jopilot.net](https://jopilot.net).

2. **Set Your Location**: Enter "Burbank, CA" in the location search bar.

3. **Filter by Distance**: Set the distance filter to 15 miles to ensure you only see jobs within that radius.

4. **Specify Job Type**: Look for options to filter by job type and select "Full-Time" to exclude part-time and gig jobs.

5. **Set Minimum Pay**: Adjust the salary filter to show only jobs that pay at least $15 per hour.

6. **Exclude Disney Jobs**: When reviewing the job listings, manually skip any positions that mention Disney or are associated with the company.

7. **Review Listings**: Go through the filtered job listings to find suitable positions that meet all your criteria.

8. **Apply**: Once you find jobs that interest you, follow the application instructions provided in the listings.

By following these steps, you should be able to find suitable full-time job opportunities in Burbank that meet your requirements.

To find full-time employment options in Burbank while adhering to your specified criteria, follow these steps:

1. **Visit the website**: Go to [https://jopilot.net](https://jopilot.net).

2. **Set your location**: Enter "Burbank" as your location and set the radius to 15 miles.

3. **Filter job types**: 
   - Exclude any Disney-related jobs.
   - Exclude part-time jobs.
   - Exclude gig jobs.

4. **Set salary requirements**: Filter for jobs that offer a minimum pay of $15 per hour.

5. **Conduct the search**: After applying all the filters, browse through the job listings that meet your criteria.

Make sure to review the job descriptions carefully to ensure they align with your preferences and qualifications. Good luck with your job search!
